name: Neon Apocalypse
description:
A flashy, manic, technicolour, physics-based score-attack with a swarm of different units

You have 12 rounds to rally your forces before descending into the Apocalypse. A classic arcade experience with the twist of physics and controlling a group of units with 7 unique classes.

Controls:

  • WASD - Move
  • Left Click (Hold) - Shoot
  • Right Click (Click) - Repulse
  • Escape - Exit game

Made in a week for the Brackeys Jam 2021.1

Theme: Stronger Together

Music by Abstraction

Three Red Hearts - Box Jump

http://abstractionmusic.bandcamp.com/

http://www.abstractionmusic.com/
